title: The Life story of a fern
brief_description: The study of the two generations in the life history of the fern. Fertilisation is described and the development of the embryo fern shown by time-lapse photography.
description: The study of the two generations in the life history of the fern. Fertilisation is described and the development of the embryo fern shown by time-lapse photography.
